Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Backhaus', 3: 'You rascals, better not disgrace me in your new units!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Albert', 3: "I can't... can't breathe...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Bruce, move over a bit.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "You're asking for the impossible.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Coates', 3: "Damn... can't push him away. How strong is this guy exactly?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Garzah', 3: 'I stopped struggling a while ago.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'On the training ground, Backhaus wraps his muscular arms around the five of them, hugging them tightly.'}
{3: 'Five heads of different colors are squeezed together like the folds on a bun, each showing varying degrees of pain.'}
{3: "Today marks the last day of training for Watanabe and his team. Their year-long training at the camp has come to an end, and it's time for everyone to part ways."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Backhaus', 3: "Alright, for this memorable last day, I'm heading to HQ to get you all something special!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just before Albert passes out, Backhaus lets go of his arm and vanishes in a flash.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Albert', 3: 'Huff... Huff... I thought I was gonna die.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Garzah', 3: 'Here, have some mint tea.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Albert', 3: 'Thank you...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Albert accepts the canteen from Garzah, while Bruce pats his back to help him catch his breath.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Coates', 3: "With that green hair, you might have a hard time catching the eye of those rich folks. It's not too late to switch careers.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Coates sounds harsh but sincere.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Albert', 3: "No, like you and Bruce, I'm preparing to join the Ground Force.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Garzah', 3: "The regular army is a hundred times tougher than the mercenaries, plus there's the elimination process.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But you're just barely getting by the way you are.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Albert takes a big gulp of mint tea and lets out a deep breath.'}
{2: 'Albert', 3: 'Backhaus is quite the maverick and places a strong emphasis on how we do on the physical tests...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Albert', 3: 'When most of the regular army cares more about whether we know how to operate the military functional armor.', 4: '1'}

{3: "With it, they all turn to look at the warehouse where the functional armor is stored. A thin layer of sand has accumulated in front of the door, a sign that it hasn't been opened for quite some time."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Albert', 3: "Actually, it's Backhaus who gave me this piece of advice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Albert', 3: "He's not exactly a big fan of functional armor, but he gave me this piece of advice anyway when he noticed how tough my neural resilience is.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Albert', 3: 'I know how much I suck, but Backhaus never gave up on me... and even made life easier for me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Albert', 3: "You guys better not tell him what I just said, because he made it clear that he didn't want me to bring up the special treatment to anyone.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Albert', 3: "Why are y'all lookin' at me like that?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Coates', 3: 'He told you too?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Uhh... I take it that he said the same thing to you guys, too?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Was it just two days ago?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Garzah', 3: 'Yup, verbatim.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Watanabe places a hand on Albert's shoulder and says earnestly."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Greenhead, Backhaus doesn't dole out special treatment to just anyone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'He only does it with his subordinates.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Garzah', 3: 'He suggested I apply for the Navy.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Garzah speaks in a muffled voice, before adding a remark.'}
{2: 'Garzah', 3: "Interesting how he thought I could live out at the sea when he's only seen me living in this desert.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Coates', 3: 'His advice to me was similar.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Two days ago, he approached me and asked if I wanted to try applying for the Air Force.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "He said there's generally no chance of seeing blood, except I think that statement is probably only half true.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Bruce, what about you?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bruce hesitates for a few seconds before he speaks.'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "He said I'd fare just fine going anywhere except for the Air Force.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bruce breaks into a wry smile.'}
{3: 'With it, the air seems to grow heavy, because they all know how badly Bruce wants to get into the Air Force.'}
{3: "Only Bruce himself and Coates, however, know what's driving Bruce's obsession."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Coates', 3: 'A piece of advice is nothing more than a piece of advice, though. Nobody says you need to do as told.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Garzah', 3: 'You have to walk your own path.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bruce', 3: "What Backhaus said makes a lot of sense, though. I'll give it some serious thought.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "I'll go pack my things first.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After Bruce leaves, the remaining three turn to look at Coates.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Coates', 3: "Don't look at me like that. There are some things I can't explain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Coates', 3: "Ask Bruce yourselves if you're that curious.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory826.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bruce', 3: 'How did you know I was here?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hearing footsteps behind him, Bruce asks without turning around.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "There aren't many places around here for sightseeing, so it wasn't hard to find you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Oh, and Coates saw you heading this way, of course.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "I see you picked up Backhaus' sense of humor there.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Well, he's not back yet and can't hear us. So, did you find it funny?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'The fact that you tried to tell a joke is more amusing.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Then I won't tell any more jokes going forward.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe sits down next to Bruce and hands him another canteen.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Here, Garzah's mint tea.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "I'll have to thank him when we get back.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bruce opens the canteen, and the rising steam carries the fresh scent of mint into the night sky.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're welcome.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Garzah told me to say that because he knew you'd thank him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: '...Guess I did ruin the fun for you guys back there, huh.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bruce smiles self-deprecatingly.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Yeah, Greenhead thinks it's all because he started it, and he feels too guilty to come find you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I really tried to talk him out of it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'So, Watanabe, why did you come here?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bruce sets down the canteen and looks up at the sky.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm just here to give you the tea. Whether I stay or not is up to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Then let me tell you a story. I have this friend who...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Silence falls over the conversation.'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "You know what, forget it. At this point, there's no need to hide anything.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bruce looks embarrassed, which is really uncommon.'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Watanabe, would you find someone a coward for taking the same path their parents did?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory526.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What was the belief that Mom left behind? Out of so many people in the world, why did it have to be her?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I think you, Dad, understand Mom of all people, and I trust that you can answer that question.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But I think this wall of experience will always stand between us no matter how hard you try to explain it to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Which is why I figured that if I became a soldier, even just a mercenary, I'd come closer to understanding Mom.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory826.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I think there's no right or wrong in pursuing something. It's just a process, not the end goal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: '...Have you heard of this story where there is a bunch of monkeys trying to scoop up the moon from the water?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You mean the story where the monkeys form a ladder up a tree with their bodies and try to scoop the moon's reflection out of the water?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Whether it was seven or eight monkeys, whether it was a well or a puddle, I can't remember.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "I don't remember if there are seven or eight, but the point is that they end up with nothing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'And it makes sense that those monkeys end up with nothing when they never have what it takes to get the real moon.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Do you think you are one of those monkeys?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Well, I suppose you know what this "moon" I\'m chasing is, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "I'm trying to go down the same path my dad went down.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "He was an ace pilot. I've admired him since I was a child and aspired to be like him.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Bruce', 3: "I'm not one of those kids who think they just have to do something to outshine their dads because they think their dads are such hotshots. I mean, I do want to be greater than my dad, too, but it's just because I want to be great.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'He told me what it feels like to soar through the sky, and I want to get a taste of what that feels like, too. I want to make him proud.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "But you know I don't have the talent. No matter how much I train, I've never gotten my sense of balance up to snuff.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "And it dawned on me quite a while ago that I just didn't have what it takes, when my dad stopped teaching me maneuvers and techniques so I wouldn't get overstressed.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "So I kept asking myself if he'd given up on me, and if I should just give up.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He reaches out his hand, as if trying to grasp the bright moon in the sky.'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "But I guess it's all starting to make sense now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "Why am I wasting time trying to scoop up the moon from the water when I know it's mission impossible?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The two fall silent, taking their time to digest those words.'}
{3: 'They might have come from different backgrounds, but right at this moment, they find themselves in such similar circumstances.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "One of them tries to go down the same path his father did, knowing full well that he doesn't have the talent it takes."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory824.jpg'}
{3: "While the other tries to understand his mother's will, which he finds difficult living in a world so peaceful."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory826.jpg'}
{3: "Could it be that Bruce is right... for thinking that they're going nowhere?"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory526.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: "Even if you've resolved to move past your wounds, never forget they existed and that you're doing this to move toward the future.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory826.jpg'}
{3: 'Watanabe suddenly recalls what his father said on his birthday.'}
{3: "He didn't quite understand what his father meant then, but seeing Bruce struggling now, Watanabe seems to have reached an eureka moment all of a sudden."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg'}
{3: 'He looks at the moon in the sky. No matter where you are, it always shines equally into the eyes of those who gaze upon it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Well, can't really say you don't have a point there.", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Boy, you honest son of a...', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But I don't think you're wrong for wanting to go down that path.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'For wanting to pursue that light, that is.', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Watanabe strings his thoughts into words, trying to get his message across.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We chase the moon in the water because it is beautiful in itself. There is nothing wrong with wanting to get closer to it.', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bruce', 3: "That sounds like what someone would say to themselves when they just don't have what it takes to get what they want.", 4: '18'}
{3: 'He raises his fist, as if capturing the moon in the sky.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't think you need to have an end goal in sight when you try to pursue the moon.", 4: '18'}
{3: 'As his fist opens, the moonlight, which he was blocking with his hand, shines into his eyes through his fingers.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It'll always be there, whether you try to pursue it or not.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Never lost, never hidden, and always shining.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'If the moon in the water is a reflection of its light, that means this light that shines upon us now is the very same moonlight, no?', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "As long as you don't turn away and walk into the darkness...", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Then no matter what we do, we'll always be in its light.", 4: '18'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory826.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory826.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe finally sees that his mother has left behind more than just epitaphs and deeds. In the cemetery where she rests in peace, her steadfast belief echoes through.'}
{3: 'And when Watanabe overcame his fears and chose to join the military, that belief was passed down.'}

{3: "He now sees that he doesn't need to be in his mother's shoes to understand her, nor does he need to arrive at the same end she didâ€”so long as he keeps his head straight and keeps heading down the same path."}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "...You're only saying these things because you've owned up to the failure that you were.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "It's just hard to let something go... when you've become too invested in it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'I really need to learn from you as far as that goes...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He closes his eyes and remains silent for a moment, struggling internally.'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "But I'll give it a try. I'll start by talking to my father again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Thank you, Watanabe.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Was gonna say the same.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'They exchange glances and raise their canteens.'}
{2: 'Watanabe & Bruce', 3: 'Cheers!', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe & Bruce', 3: 'Cough...', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'They choke on the hot water in their canteens.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Let's go. The ignition ceremony of the Zero-point Reactor is taking place today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't really know what it's all about, but people have all gathered around the big screen. Let's go and join the fun.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '30 seconds until ignition of Zero-point Reactor One.'}
{3: '30 seconds until ignition of Zero-point Reactor One.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory519.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jada', 3: 'A bit higher. Yes, just like that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: "That's it. Any higher and I'll hit the ceiling.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Philip', 3: 'Alright, stop micromanaging. See, the poor "Tall Guy" doesn\'t know what to say now because of you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jada', 3: 'Say that again after you get off his left arm!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'In the cafeteria of the International Space Station, a huge projection screen is live-streaming the first ignition of Zero-point Reactor.'}
{3: 'Almost everyone on the space station, regardless of their duty or how busy they are, has gathered here.'}
{2: 'Philip', 3: 'What are these guys doing out here when they usually prefer to rot in the lab?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: 'No one wants to miss the ignition, I presume?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Thanks to this, the two who arrived late because of their shift had to ask "Tall Guy" to lift them up.'}
{2: 'Philip', 3: "I say, why not just switch the cabin to zero-gravity mode? Pretty sure we'd be able to use the space more effectively that way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: "Forget it. You're not gonna rebalance the gravity field afterward, are you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: 'Shh, the countdown is starting!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '15 seconds until ignition of Zero-point Reactor One.'}
{3: '15 seconds until ignition of Zero-point Reactor One.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory424.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Spotted Deer', 3: 'This is Spotted Deer. Area A-2 is all clear.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory72.jpg'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Area B-2 all clear.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory314.png'}
{2: '???', 3: 'One stealth drone shot down in Area C-1. Anomalies all cleared.'}

{3: 'A total of 26 monitoring zones completely cover the area within 2 kilometers of Reactor One. The Security Intelligence Bureau has deployed half of its elite forces to ensure the ignition is free from interference.'}
{3: 'Continuous reports stream into the command vehicle through the communication channels as the newly appointed director of the Security Intelligence Bureau personally oversees the operation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ballard', 3: "Stay sharp and keep an eye out for the surroundings, especially the areas covered in vegetation. We don't want to let anyone in who's trying to wreak havoc here.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '10 seconds until ignition of Zero-point Reactor One.'}
{3: '10 seconds until ignition of Zero-point Reactor One.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: "I thought you'd be in the front rows for something like this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trillard', 3: "I was going to... except my secretary couldn't handle all the paperwork.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trillard', 3: 'This will surely be one of those regrets I take to the grave, right?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Trillard opens a bottle of red wine, the label still intact, and pours it into two goblets.'}
{2: 'Trillard', 3: 'Fancy a glass?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: "I didn't know you drank.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trillard', 3: 'Well, now you do.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trillard', 3: "Tis a day worth celebrating. One glass shouldn't get me drunk, right?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Trillard checks the alcohol content again.'}
{2: 'Trillard', 3: 'I even consulted a doctor about this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: "Don't waste the doctor's time with these silly questions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trillard', 3: "There's still work tomorrow. Work ain't gonna stop just because I'm celebrating.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Trillard raises his glass.'}
{2: 'Trillard', 3: 'To tomorrow.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hans', 3: 'To tomorrow.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sound of glasses clinking echoes crisply, and the red liquid swirls under the light.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '5 seconds until ignition of Zero-point Reactor One.'}
{3: '5 seconds until ignition of Zero-point Reactor One.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory733.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory717.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Father, can you hear me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'I have something to...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Hey, Bruce?'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Hey? Bruce!'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory839.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory840.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory840.jpg'}
{3: 'Zero-point Reactor One ignited.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory841.jpg'}
{3: 'Outbreak of the Punishing'}
